alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:28PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tulare and eastern Fresno Counties through 300 PM PDT... At 227 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles north of Three Rivers, or 31 miles southwest of South Lake, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Balch Power House, Grant Grove, Crystal Springs Campground, Big Meadows, Park Ridge, Azalea Campground, Sunset Campground, Hume Lake and Grant Grove Visitor Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
